entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 42 %
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
